home.title: The best platform enroll in your special course

facts.1: of our students achieve conversational English in just 3 months

target.title: Set your target and we’ll make sure you hit it
target.description1: If you're just starting to learn English, our courses will help you master the basics from scratch
target.description2: English for Developers: master tech vocabulary and boost your skills for international projects
target.description3: Enhance your English proficiency and refine skills for fluent communication in professional settings
target.description4: Medical English Proficiency: develop specialized vocabulary for foreign Healthcare settings
target.description5: Learn English to communicate freely while traveling and feel confident abroad
target.description6: Fun English lessons for kids - learning through games and creativity, no memorization needed
target.description7: Master Business English and take your career to the next level with practical skills
target.description8: Get your required IELTS/TOEFL score - our guaranteed preparation program

0.title: LIMN helped me prepare for my exam
0.text: The classes at LIMN gave me everything I needed to get ready for my IELTS exam, and I achieved my target score! I highly recommend this school to anyone serious about success.
0.author: Tatyana A.

1.title: I loved the flexible schedule
1.text: The adaptable class timetable was perfect for my full-time job. The courses are excellently tailored to my current level.
1.author: Elena S.

2.title: From beginner to understanding movies & speaking confidently
2.text: When I first joined LIMN, my English level was very basic. I was afraid to speak, mixed up tenses constantly, and couldn’t catch most phrases in movies. But thanks to my teacher’s attentive approach and LIMN’s brilliant learning system, I progressed faster than I ever imagined. A huge thank you to the LIMN team for their professionalism and personalized attention!
2.author: Alexandra M.

3.title: Felt supported every step of the way
3.text: The course was perfectly structured, and I truly felt supported at every stage. I especially loved the interactive exercises that helped reinforce the material – they made learning engaging and effective.
3.author: Liza K.

4.title: My pronunciation improved dramatically
4.text: In just a short time, I saw significant progress. The lessons with native speakers were especially valuable - they helped me improve both my pronunciation and conversational confidence.
4.author: Olesya F.

5.title: Now I communicate confidently with colleagues
5.text: Studying at LIMN completely transformed my relationship with English! I used to be afraid to speak, but now I confidently communicate with colleagues in international meetings.
5.author: Dmitry K.

action.text: Our students achieve conversational English in just 3 months
action.question: Why not you?
